messages.message:
Looked at the following:
1. The OCR Settings: Nothing is explicitly set in configuration which means there should be no metadata, no word list, and no images held in memory.
2. The document is just pdf-to-text, so we should not be doing any kind of image processing.
3. The size of the document is 7MB, so it is not large enough to cause such a bloat.
Iâ€™ll copy these in Asana so that we can track them
